entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 11. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 21 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Thursday 16 March 2023
